item.title: Mid-Evil Template Release
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:28, topic:441646”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=544338.msg3990787#msg3990787 date=1336558339]
Nice layout.

I’m 110% sure I’ve seen this on one of those free css template sites before…

If it is your work then it isn’t a bad job, but you could’ve done a lot more to it.
If it isn’t your work then, lol @ you.

Hi Ruby Forums Coder, do you code your forums in Ruby?
[/quote]
Coding is when you edit and change code, generally not create it as that is programming. His names contradictory.

Anyways on-topic, looks okay I guess… Good if your starting out and know nothing sort of thing as its pretty simple. Something even I could do and I’m a noob xD.[/quote]

I rushed the body portion. I’m going to be making a V2 of the template soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Mid-Evil Template Release
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:29, topic:441646”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=544338.msg3991559#msg3991559 date=1336651366]

Nice layout.

I’m 110% sure I’ve seen this on one of those free css template sites before…

If it is your work then it isn’t a bad job, but you could’ve done a lot more to it.
If it isn’t your work then, lol @ you.

Hi Ruby Forums Coder, do you code your forums in Ruby?

Coding is when you edit and change code, generally not create it as that is programming. His names contradictory.

Anyways on-topic, looks okay I guess… Good if your starting out and know nothing sort of thing as its pretty simple. Something even I could do and I’m a noob xD.
[/quote]

I agree with you. I generally use the word programming when referring to such a thing, but I felt that calling Ruby Forums Coder a “coder” would be more suitable.

In MoparScape, coding does refer to changing numbers, but in most communities (and in the outside world, including actual programmers), coding is synonymous to programming. Just a thought.[/quote]
Yeah ;p

Read full topic

If it is your work then it isn’t a bad job, but you could’ve done a lot more to it.
If it isn’t your work then, lol @ you.

Hi Ruby Forums Coder, do you code your forums in Ruby?
[/quote]
Coding is when you edit and change code, generally not create it as that is programming. His names contradictory.

Anyways on-topic, looks okay I guess… Good if your starting out and know nothing sort of thing as its pretty simple. Something even I could do and I’m a noob xD.[/quote]

I agree with you. I generally use the word programming when referring to such a thing, but I felt that calling Ruby Forums Coder a “coder” would be more suitable.

In MoparScape, coding does refer to changing numbers, but in most communities (and in the outside world, including actual programmers), coding is synonymous to programming. Just a thought.

@Fridder,

Yes I know. I made the name “Mid-Evil” on purpose.

#FLuffy

Make a folder on the desktop and extract everything from the .zip to that folder. Your copying JUST the HTML which isn’t loading the images or CSS because you don’t have it in the right spot.

item.title: Mid-Evil Template Release
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

tainted4pure:

[quote]How can I redirect the top buttons?

Open Index.html with notepad and find

  • Home

    • Replace the # with your redirect link.[/quote]

    All links in the template are # by default. Just search up # and change the links to whatever.

    Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tainted4pure tainted4pure
item.description:
@tainted4pure wrote:

How can I redirect the top buttons?

Open Index.html with notepad and find

  • Home

    • Replace the # with your redirect link.
